posts.post_content: I haven’t asked in awhile but anyone have any tough ORVAL OVERALL cards/items available (or just wanna show em off)? Always looking for new stuff and upgrades!
I have an Orvall Overall P150 in PSA 4 if it's anything you care about.  Obviously not a rare item but a nice looking portrait none the less.

Here’s a few Overall’s (just for show)

The AB No Frame was the last one I found to complete the subset (commons only)

Cheers!

Thx for the offer - i have a Port p150 SGC 7 already. But love that card! Such insane colors on the p150s!

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=2345369]I have an Orvall Overall P150 in PSA 4 if it's anything you care about.  Obviously not a rare item but a nice looking portrait none the less.[/QUOTE]

Love all three! I was trying to get that tolstoi waist off you for the past couple years but finally located one for myself. I still need to AB460 on the hands face (i have a 350) but Jay is the only person i know who has one and he won't sell!!!

[quote name="nineunder71" post=2345372]Here’s a few Overall’s (just for show)

The AB No Frame was the last one I found to complete the subset (commons only)

Cheers![/QUOTE]
